---

# air-user-profile
<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## 属性
| 属性    | 属性    | 描述 | 类型      | 默认值     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `avatarSrc` | `avatar-src` |             | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `editable`  | `editable`   |             | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `userBio`   | `user-bio`   |             | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `userName`  | `user-name`  |             | `string`  | `undefined` |

## 依赖项
### 取决于
- [air-avatar](../basic-components/avatar)
- [air-text](../basic-components/text)
- [air-input](../basic-components/input)
- [air-button](../basic-components/button)

### 1. 基本用户资料
<air-previewer size="large">
  <air-user-profile
    avatar-src="https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/146103794?v=4"
    user-name="Zhi"
    user-bio="前端开发者，热爱技术分享"
    editable="true"
  ></air-user-profile>
</air-previewer>

### 5. 自定义插槽内容

<air-previewer size="large">
  <air-user-profile
    avatar-src="https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/146103794?v=4"
    user-name="Custom User"
  >
    <div slot="title" class="custom-title">
      🔥 Custom Title: Super User
    </div>
    <div slot="content" class="custom-content">
      This is a custom bio for a special user.
    </div>
  </air-user-profile>
</air-previewer>

<air-previewer size="large">
<air-user-profile
    avatar-src="https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/146103794?v=4"
    user-name="Stats User"
    user-bio="UI/UX Designer with an eye for detail."
  >
    <div slot="content">
      <p>Bio: Passionate about design systems.</p>
      <div>
        <div>
          <strong>Followers:</strong> 1200
        </div>
        <div>
          <strong>Following:</strong> 180
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
